description.value:
Requirements An enemy you've damaged with a ranged weapon during the last minute is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from you.

Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim. Make a ranged weapon Strike against the required target. This Strike ignores the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition and reduces the flat check for the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} condition from 11 to 5.
